metadata.title: CVE-2018-1287 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Apache JMeter 2.X and 3.X, when using Distributed Test only (RMI based),jmeter server binds RMI Registry to wildcard host. This could allow anattacker to get Access to JMeterEngine and send unauthorized code.

criterions.comment: jakarta-jmeter package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
